law.catch_line: Any person feeling himself aggrieved by any determination of the county commissioners, or by any pro...
law.text: Any person feeling himself aggrieved by any determination of the county commissioners, or by any proceedings had under this subtitle relating to works of improvement, may appeal to the circuit court of the county in which such determination was made or proceedings were had, and shall be entitled to trial by jury, at the election of either party.
